Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Methods
Deprecated Methods
org.thymeleaf.templateresolver.TemplateResolver.addCacheablePattern(String)
          will be removed in thymeleaf 1.0.0-beta5. Use getCacheablePatternSpec().addPattern(String) instead. 
org.thymeleaf.templateresolver.TemplateResolver.addHtml5TemplateModePattern(String)
          will be removed in thymeleaf 1.0.0-beta5. Use getHtml5TemplateModePatternSpec().addPattern(String) instead. 
org.thymeleaf.templateresolver.TemplateResolver.addLegacyHtml5TemplateModePattern(String)
          will be removed in thymeleaf 1.0.0-beta5. Use getLegacyHtml5TemplateModePatternSpec().addPattern(String) instead. 
org.thymeleaf.templateresolver.TemplateResolver.addNonCacheablePattern(String)
          will be removed in thymeleaf 1.0.0-beta5. Use getNonCacheablePatternSpec().addPattern(String) instead. 
org.thymeleaf.templateresolver.TemplateResolver.addValidXhtmlTemplateModePattern(String)
          will be removed in thymeleaf 1.0.0-beta5. Use getValidXhtmlTemplateModePatternSpec().addPattern(String) instead. 
org.thymeleaf.templateresolver.TemplateResolver.addValidXmlTemplateModePattern(String)
          will be removed in thymeleaf 1.0.0-beta5. Use getValidXmlTemplateModePatternSpec().addPattern(String) instead. 
org.thymeleaf.templateresolver.TemplateResolver.addXhtmlTemplateModePattern(String)
          will be removed in thymeleaf 1.0.0-beta5. Use getXhtmlTemplateModePatternSpec().addPattern(String) instead. 
org.thymeleaf.templateresolver.TemplateResolver.addXmlTemplateModePattern(String)
          will be removed in thymeleaf 1.0.0-beta5. Use getXmlTemplateModePatternSpec().addPattern(String) instead. 
org.thymeleaf.templateresolver.TemplateResolver.clearCacheablePatterns()
          will be removed in thymeleaf 1.0.0-beta5. Use getCacheablePatternSpec().clearPatterns() instead. 
org.thymeleaf.templateresolver.TemplateResolver.clearHtml5TemplateModePatterns()
          will be removed in thymeleaf 1.0.0-beta5. Use getHtml5TemplateModePatternSpec().clearPatterns() instead. 
org.thymeleaf.templateresolver.TemplateResolver.clearLegacyHtml5TemplateModePatterns()
          will be removed in thymeleaf 1.0.0-beta5. Use getLegacyHtml5TemplateModePatternSpec().clearPatterns() instead. 
org.thymeleaf.templateresolver.TemplateResolver.clearNonCacheablePatterns()
          will be removed in thymeleaf 1.0.0-beta5. Use getNonCacheablePatternSpec().clearPatterns() instead. 
org.thymeleaf.templateresolver.TemplateResolver.clearValidXhtmlTemplateModePatterns()
          will be removed in thymeleaf 1.0.0-beta5. Use getValidXhtmlTemplateModePatternSpec().clearPatterns() instead. 
org.thymeleaf.templateresolver.TemplateResolver.clearValidXmlTemplateModePatterns()
          will be removed in thymeleaf 1.0.0-beta5. Use getValidXmlTemplateModePatternSpec().clearPatterns() instead. 
org.thymeleaf.templateresolver.TemplateResolver.clearXhtmlTemplateModePatterns()
          will be removed in thymeleaf 1.0.0-beta5. Use getXhtmlTemplateModePatternSpec().clearPatterns() instead. 
org.thymeleaf.templateresolver.TemplateResolver.clearXmlTemplateModePatterns()
          will be removed in thymeleaf 1.0.0-beta5. Use getXmlTemplateModePatternSpec().clearPatterns() instead. 
org.thymeleaf.Configuration.getAttrProcessors()
          If you need to obtain the attr processors for a specific dialect, use Configuration.getAttrProcessors(Class) This method will be removed in 1.0.0-beta5. 
org.thymeleaf.Configuration.getDialect()
          Configuration can now be multi-dialect, so use Configuration.getDialects() instead. This method will be removed in 1.0.0-beta5. 
org.thymeleaf.TemplateEngine.getDialect()
          TemplateEngine can now be multi-dialect, so use TemplateEngine.getDialects() instead. This method will be removed in 1.0.0-beta5. 
org.thymeleaf.Configuration.getTagProcessors()
          If you need to obtain the tag processors for a specific dialect, use Configuration.getTagProcessors(Class) This method will be removed in 1.0.0-beta5. 
org.thymeleaf.Configuration.getValueProcessorByClass(Class)
          Use instead the versions of this method that accept an ITagProcessor, IAttrProcessor or IValueProcessor as its first argument. This is required for allowing multi-project setups. This method will be removed in 1.0.0-beta5. 
org.thymeleaf.Configuration.getValueProcessors()
          If you need to obtain the value processors for a specific dialect, use Configuration.getValueProcessors(Class) This method will be removed in 1.0.0-beta5.
